full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO'I BSKANG BSHAGS SGRUB THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES MYUD MDZAD YE SHES KYIS MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BYIN BRLABS CAN DU MA YOD BZHIN DU, ,YAN LAG BRGYAD LDAN GYI TSE DGUM DU BA TSAR KHRON BA BRKO BA'I DAL BA 'DI 'DRA MI DGOS 'DUG KYANG, ,RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, ,MGON PO'I MNGON RTOGS BSKANG BSHAGS BZLAS PA, GTOR @008A *, ,'BUL, BSTOD BSKUL SOGS CHA TSANG ZHING, TSIG NYUNG BRGYUN 'KHYER DU BYED RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL NGOR, BSKANG BSHAGS GNYIS RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS MDZAD PA DANG BSTOD PA SNYING PA GZHIR BZHAG ,GZHAN RNAMS TSIG SBYOR GSAR DU BGYI STE BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR YI GE PAS YE SHES MGON POS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,)
